QuestData.Title: Better Late Than Dead
QuestData.Description: Greetings, friend.$b$bIt is good to see that you survived your battle in one piece.$b$bWhile Erunak tries to scry a place of safety for us all, I shall assist you in securing a less strenuous means of transport.$b$bI have prepared this baitstick to use near a sea turtle. It is crude, but it should serve to bring one under your control.$b$bOnce you've become comfortable with the animal, simply guide it back here to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Moanah's Baitstick on a Speckled Sea Turtle and ride it back to her.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to tame a sea turtle, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: How unfortunate...$b$bWell, all things considered, it is good to see that you made it back unharmed.
